title: I Hear You Knockin : The Sound of New Orleans Rhythm and Blues
description: A must for fans of Rhythm and Blues and New Orleans Music. Now in its fourth printing, Jeff Hannusch received an American Book Award in 1986 for this well written and lavishly illustrated volume of history and the stories of success and failure of more than two dozen important New Orleans Rhythm and Blues figures. Paperback only, 388 pages, 5.5x8.5 inches
author: Jeff Hannusch
